name: Remnants of the Past
pages: Howsoever we find the World now, it was not always thus. On the Islands and beneath the Waves lay Ruins of Times past, some nearly crumbled to Dust, some intact.$(p)The Villagers shun these, but a bold Adventurer may find Treasure and Trash among the Rubble.$(p)Of the great Cities of Legend there are few Signs, though old Sailors speak of strange Lights that beckon from the deepest Waters.$(p)

pages.title: A Tower
pages.text: Little is known of the looming Spires that pierce the Skies and the Deeps, but some say great Prizes await those who scale their Heights.$(p)
